sentences.sCn: 很多桥横亘在泰晤士河上。

sentences.sContent: We houseboated along the Thames yesterday.
sentences.sCn: 我们昨天乘居住船游览了泰晤士河的沿岸风光。

sentences.sContent: London, capital of Great Britain, SE England, on both sides of the Thames River.
sentences.sContent_eng: London, capital of Great Britain, SE England, on both sides of the Thames River.
sentences.sCn: 伦敦，英国的首都，位于英格兰的东南方，泰晤士河流经这里。

trans.tranCn: 泰晤士河(流经牛津,伦敦等)
